text: "Forever Young" is a 1988 song by Rod Stewart and is the second single from his 15th studio album Out of Order. It went to number 12 in the United States, number 57 in the United Kingdom, number 3 in South Africa, number 41 in Ireland and number 9 in Canada. ==References== Category:1988 songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Rod Stewart songs
title: Forever Young (Rod Stewart song)
